feeds-list.description: Returns all the feeds within the source

uriParameters.name: feedID
uriParameters.description: The id of the feed to retrieve

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The url of the feed to add

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: The ID of the folder in which to add the new feed

uriParameters.name: feedID
uriParameters.description: The id of the feed to delete

feed-move.description: Moves a feed to a new subfolder and/or position within the folder

uriParameters.name: feedID
uriParameters.description: The id of the feed to move

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The new sort order of the feed (the position within the new parent folder)

parameters.name: parentFolderID
parameters.description: The (new) folder parent to put the feed in

feed-markasread.description: Marks all posts in the feed as read

uriParameters.name: feedID
uriParameters.description: The id of the feed to mark as read
